scripts.migrate: npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --config sequelize.config.cjs --migrations-path src/migrations --seeders-path src/seeders
scripts.migrate:undo: npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo --config sequelize.config.cjs --migrations-path src/migrations --seeders-path src/seeders
scripts.migration:generate: npx sequelize-cli migration:generate --config sequelize.config.cjs --migrations-path src/migrations --seeders-path src/seeders --name
